dimensions:
Warp:206.5cm (81 1/2in.). Weft: 138.5cm (50in.)
Two pieces sewn together.
title: Le mouton cheri (The Dear Lamb)
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
description:
Several scenes of amorous couples (one of them playing with a lamb) and of women with babies. In red on white. 
Quilted and mounted on linen.
name: Panel
